animeDescription: The main character, a cat named Nyatto, embarks upon a journey to save his sister's soul, which was ripped in two when Nyatto tried to save her from Death. She trails after him, brain-dead. They encounter many brilliant, mind-bending situations, beginning with a disturbing magic show.(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Nekojiru Udon', 'Alternative version: Nekojiru Gekijou Jirujiru Original']
animeStaff: [['Satou, Tatsuo', 'Director'], ['Yuasa, Masaaki', 'Episode Director, Script, Storyboard, Animation Director'], ['Yoshinari, You', 'Key Animation'], ['Nekojiru', 'Original Creator']]
